add(amount_of_units, activation_func)[source]¶

Adding full-connected (FC) layer

Keyword arguments:
amount_of_units - amount of neurons in layer activation_func - activation function of this layer

Adding sub nets

Keyword arguments:
sub_nets – list of sub nets activation_funcs – list of functions, length must be same as amount of layers in every sub net
